LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesHydraulicSerum.label: Nanites Bank (Hydraulic)
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesHydraulicSerum.description: A one-use bank of nanites tuned to repair broken android hydraulic systems (related to old age).
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesHydraulicSerum.comps.CompUsa: Use this nanite serum to fix android age issues
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesCPUSerum.label: Nanites Bank (CPU)
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesCPUSerum.description: A one-use bank of nanites tuned to repair broken android artificial brain systems (related to old age).
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesCPUSerum.comps.CompUsable.us: Use this nanite serum to fix android age issues
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesCoolingSerum.label: Nanites Bank (Cooling)
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesCoolingSerum.description: A one-use bank of nanites tuned to repair broken android cooling systems in case of overheating (related to old age).
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesCoolingSerum.comps.CompUsabl: Use this nanite serum to fix android age issues
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesFrameSerum.label: Nanites Bank (Framework)
LanguageData.ATPP_NanitesFrameSerum.description: A one-use bank of nanites tuned to repair broken android exoskeletons (related to old age).
Use this nanite serum to fix android age issues
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidNanokitBasic.label: Basic Nanokit
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidNanokitBasic.description: A kit containing nanobots to treat the wounds of androids
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidNanokitIntermediate.label: Intermediate Nanokit
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidNanokitIntermediate.descript: A kit containing nanobots to treat the wounds of androids
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidNanokitAdvanced.label: Advanced Nanokit
LanguageData.ATPP_AndroidNanokitAdvanced.description: A kit containing nanobots to treat the wounds of androids
LanguageData.ATPP_RXChip.label: RX Neural Chip
LanguageData.ATPP_RXChip.description: A neural chip acting as a personal SkyMind relay.
LanguageData.ATPP_VX0Chip.label: VX0 Neural Chip
LanguageData.ATPP_VX0Chip.description: A neural chip which transforms its host into a biological surrogate.
LanguageData.ATPP_VX1Chip.label: VX1 Neural Chip
LanguageData.ATPP_VX1Chip.description: A neural chip allowing its host to remotely control any SX series android or biological surrogate.
LanguageData.ATPP_VX2Chip.label: VX2 Neural Chip
LanguageData.ATPP_VX2Chip.description: A neural chip allowing its host to remotely control any SX series android or biological surrogate and permute/duplicate their mind.
LanguageData.ATPP_VX3Chip.label: VX3 Neural Chip
LanguageData.ATPP_VX3Chip.description: A neural chip allowing its host to remotely control mulitple SX series androids or biological surrogates at the same time and permute/duplicate their mind.
LanguageData.ATPP_T1ArtificialBrain.label: Artificial Brain T1
LanguageData.ATPP_T1ArtificialBrain.description: An artificial T1 brain, allowing to transform a T1 surrogate into a blank neural network android
LanguageData.ATPP_T2ArtificialBrain.label: Artificial Brain T2
LanguageData.ATPP_T2ArtificialBrain.description: An artificial T2 brain, allowing to transform a T2 surrogate into a blank neural network android
LanguageData.ATPP_T3ArtificialBrain.label: Artificial Brain T3
LanguageData.ATPP_T3ArtificialBrain.description: An artificial T3 brain, allowing to transform a T3 surrogate into a blank neural network android
LanguageData.ATPP_T4ArtificialBrain.label: Artificial Brain T4
LanguageData.ATPP_T4ArtificialBrain.description: An artificial T4 brain, allowing to transform a T4 surrogate into a blank neural network android
